recipe.title: Rice Pilaf with Pine Nuts
ingredients: 1/2 cup pine nuts, toasted if desired
instructions: Heat oil in small saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion and sauté until soft, about 5 minutes. Stir in rice. Add broth; bring to boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes. Fluff rice with fork; add pine nuts. Season with salt and pepper.
